scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../service-express && npm install && cd ../service-hono && npm install && cd ../service-fastapi && python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../service-flask && python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
